name: World War: Special Combat Ops
description:
World War: Special Combat Ops is a action survival shooter war game. You play as a part of special force in battlefield to end the modern war strike.Being a silent assassin with most compelling sniper experience kill enemies from all sides in modern warfare. You will be the hero of world war who will lead the war solider through ruined cities,forests,deserts and area taken by enemy with full commando Action. Choose your favorite weapons from unlimited arsenal customize them and level up to boast your skills! Be the survival hero and fight till the last moment you live. Win the thrilling and epic war
Features:
- Very realistic 3D graphics and cool animation
- Real environmental effects
- Exciting task
- Deadly weapons
- Obsessed game
- Simple and intuitive manipulation.
